Name: It'sRoachTime!
About the game: It'sRoachTime! - is a hardcore, third person 3D online pvp fighting arena game! * Fight as a mutant cockroach in real time insect simulator, find your way to survive, destroy them all! * Various themed arenas in the post-Soviet apocalypse. * Standard weapons are the past, fight with homemade needles, razor blades, paws of birds and insects! * How you decide to defeat your opponents is entirely up to you. Assault from the front and fight all at once or ambush enemies one at a time! * Unique cockroach music and sound effects from the 'Henry' band. * Comic Artist's works Sergei Kritzien. * The apartment is fraught with danger: gas fire, explosions and falls. We add more and more dangerous surprises! * The game mode 'DeathMatch' is completely ready. There will be more in the future! * Our team is gonna make it better every bloody day even after the release!
